entity.name: Andrew Cuomo
entity.description: Governor of New York, Andrew Cuomo

text: @NYGovCuomo Your orders put COVID19 patients in nursing homes with the weakest and most susceptible of our society. It is not Trump's fault;it is yours. YOU gave the order. Their deaths are on your hands. Because it was YOUR orders. And only yours. You and you alone are responsible.
